ModMetaData.name: Penoxycyline For More
ModMetaData.author: TheGoofyOne
ModMetaData.description:
Penoxycyline For More
Patches Penoxycyline to also block the following: MuscleParasites Flu GutWorms
And for your animals: Animal_Plague Animal_Flu
Adds Lucoxycyline, a new drug that last twice as long and blocks everything Penoxycycline does as well as Fibrous and Sensory Mechanites. Craftable after Penoxycyline research with 2 Penoxycyline and 1 Luciferium.
Adds a new HD texture for Penoxycyline to better match the new drug Lucoxycyline texture.
Safe to add to saves but your drug policies and stockpiles will need to be updated.
